about_the_game:
"Truly Twinbells would be a boring, regular city... If not for The Mysterious Thief, Forget Me Not."

Dazzling phantom thief heists, romantic meetings in the dead of night, and making a name for yourself; The Mysterious Thief, Forget Me Not is a mostly linear visual novel that features multiple POVs throughout. The story is set in the fictional city of Twinbells, England, and shows how the lives of our four main characters are changed forever when a ballet company — and its treasured jewel — visits the phantom thief-loving city. 

  • ~80k words (roughly 4 hours long)

  • The first chapter as a free demo (~16k words, roughly 1h long)

  • Point-and-click style exploration mechanics

  • Over 20 CGs and cut-ins

  • Four chapters, centering around each main character

  • Two ladies who slowly fall in love

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible (Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game is non-notarized. May not work with 10.15 Catalina
